title: Tyga is spotted with his arm around new mystery woman after late night run-in ex Kylie Jenner
text:
He's recently been linked yet again to one of the most successful models and media moguls in the world, who is newly single.

But on Friday, rapper Tyga seemed to have left all the recent Kylie Jenner rumors behind when he was spotted with a beautiful new mystery woman at Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights haunted theme park in Universal City, California.

The musician, 29, sported a thick red flannel shirt over a black hoodie with text on the front.

Who's she: On Friday, rapper Tyga seemed to have left all the recent Kylie Jenner rumors behind when he was spotted with a beautiful new mystery woman

He also wore baggy black pants, and stayed close to his beautiful brunette date for the evening, at one point putting his arm around her.

Tyga's companion also donned a a black hoodie, but hers featured a square graphic of The Beatles' iconic Abbey Road album cover.

She gave a leggy display for the outing, wearing the oversized sweatshirt and short leggings underneath.

As they ambled from one haunted maze to the next, Tyga and his lady friend kept a couple of bodyguards close at hand, as well as some friends.

Keep an eye out: Tyga and his companion ambled from one haunted maze to the next at Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights haunted theme park in Universal City

Reds and blacks: The musician sported a thick red flannel shirt over a black hoodie with text on the front

Group outing: Tyga and his lady friend kept a couple of bodyguards close at hand, as well as some friends

In step: She gave a leggy display for the outing, wearing her oversized sweatshirt and short leggings underneath

Getting into the 'ween spirit: Tyga seemed to have left all the recent Kylie Jenner rumors behind when he was spotted with his beautiful new mystery woman

The Taste rapper has recently found himself at the center of some buzzy rumors involving his ex-girlfriend Kylie Jenner, who last week revealed she is no longer together with Travis Scott, the father to her baby daughter.

This week, the rumor mill hit fever pitch when Kylie's outing with some girlfriends on Wednesday night took a late-night turn straight to a hotel studio where Tyga was at work.

Curiously, rather than dropping her pals off at the main entrance, her Rolls Royce was pictured parked for some time inside the hotel's lot.

Kicks: She rounded off her casual ensemble with a pair of black sneakers

Only the best: The mystery woman who joined Tyga out accessorized her outfit with a red and white Adidas backpack

In transit: The pair could be seen heading down an escalator together

Recent news: His Horror Nights trip comes a couple of days after Kylie was glimpsed paying a 2am visit with pals to an LA hotel while he was using the resort's recording studio

The next day, Jenner was quick to deny anything unseemly about the potential late-night meet, claiming that she was there just to 'drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'

Cryptically, however, Tyga later took to his Instagram stories, where he posted a blue cap — known to some as code for 'frontin', or, lying about a situation.

On Friday evening, Tyga's less-than-clear posting continued, when he uploaded a selfie to Instagram wearing a large Swarovski teddy bear around his neck, followed by a closeup of the enormous accessory.

He captioned the set of photos, 'She want control over me...' although it wasn't at all clear whether he meant Kylie, another 'she' in his life, or just the teddy bear.
description: On Friday, rapper Tyga seemed to have left all the recent Kylie Jenner rumors behind when he was spotted with a beautiful new mystery woman at Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights.
